column1: Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  times  in  the  sea  areas  extending  from  Batticaloa  to
Beruwala via Pottuvil, Hambanthota and Matara.
Winds will be north-easterly in the sea areas around the island and speed will be (30-40) kmph.
Wind speed can increase up to (50-60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam. Wind speed can increase up to (40-50) kmph at times in
